name: Tohojgaard Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: My wife, our young daughter and I stayed here for two nights and had a wonderful time. Christine is a great and inspiring host. Apart from the nearby beach, you will need a mode of transportation to get around.
reviews.title: Great B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Positive
reviews.title: An oasis of calm

reviews.text: +Attention to details. It was great to be greeted with a cold drink and flowers in the room
reviews.title: Totally befitting of the peace and quiet we expected in Møns.

reviews.text: +Breakfast. Absolutely wonderful breakfast, better than many hotels
reviews.title: Perfect place to renew your energy

reviews.text: +Amenities. Not only was did we get a room & breakfast but also wifi, big social area with ocean view, tv, games, kitchen. The social area also featured a self service at very reasonable prices.
reviews.title: A little gem

reviews.text: A very warm and kind service we experienced at Tohøjgård.
reviews.title: Warm service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent homemade food made with love.
reviews.title: A one of a kind get away 1 hr from Copenhagen

reviews.text: The room and the rest of the place, was full of atmosphere and we felt very welcome and a little bit like beeing at home.
reviews.title: Trip to Mon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The cleaning was actually much better, than we have seen in a lots of hotels before.
reviews.title: Wonderful island get away near Copenhagen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The nature and the lovely silence is also fantastic.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: This is a really nice place, with a lovely atmosphere. The rooms are so clean and comfortable, and the breakfast is fantastic. Homemade jam, choices of juice, bread, fruit, cereals and so on.
reviews.title: Superb B&B - breakfast buffet is fantastic.

reviews.text: The owner is really nice. The area is beautiful. And we enjoyed the swings in the garden too :-)
reviews.title: Lovely, lovely, lovely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Br, Rie
reviews.title: A wonderful stay

reviews.text: We stayed in the rooms Hunter and Sunset in June 2012, three adults and one 3-year old, which turned out to be a very good choice for us. The rooms are decorated in a very personal style and are very nice and clean. Christine is a very pleasant person, who also makes a lovey breakfast. Christine could give us a lot of good tips on nice restaurants, which we very grateful for. All in all, a very nice place to stay at Møn.
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a very pleasant stay at Toejgaard Guesthouse, which is a very beautiful place. We stayed in the room Shangri La with a view to the sea. The atmosphere at the guesthouse encourages you to 'unplug' from your everyday life. Christine is an excellent host and she has also inspired us by the way she does things.
reviews.title: Fabulous Location For Those Loving Peace and Quiet

reviews.text: The stay at Tohoejgaard was a really unique experience for us. Christine received us with a warm and cozy room even though we arrived really late. The beds were comfortable, and the room, well kept. We were amazed at the attention she gave to the details. Each room has a character of it's own, and tastefully decorated.
reviews.title: Truly amazing experience!

reviews.text: The lounge area was also a great place to hang out in the evenings with a great sea view.
reviews.title: Nice stay for a trip around møn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The view from our room was amazing and I'll never forget waking up one morning to watch the sun rising up from the sea to the orange sky. Truly amazing experience!
reviews.title: STUNNING views and great food!

reviews.text: Manu & Paulina
reviews.title: Meditative tranquillity, thoughtful hosts, simple accommodations

reviews.text: We had a very comfortable stay here, nice rooms, everything well looked after. And of course an awesome location. Especially since we had the most perfect weather. Blue skies all week! Who says it always rains in Denmark? We traveled around the island for a few days and the b&b was very nice to come home to in the evening.
reviews.title: Very cozy and beautiful location. Reccommended

description: Welcome to Tohojgaard Bed & Breakfast. Fresh sea air… the gentle sound of surf… deep, quiet forests… delightful breakfasts and steaming coffee… a cool glass of wine… That’s what we call “Life. Unplugged.”And it is yours to enjoy at Tohojgaard: a B&B “plus” on the Danish island of Mon, overlooking the Baltic Sea. Visit us and leave the noise and stress of daily life far behind.
